scripts.lint:js: npm run lint:js:theme && npm run lint:js:components
scripts.lint:scss: npm run lint:scss:theme && npm run lint:scss:components
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:scss
scripts.build:styleguide:css: npm run build:css && rm -f styleguide/styles/theme.css && cat templates/*/*.css components/*/*.css > dist/styleguide/theme.css
scripts.build:js:components: npm run lint:js:components && babel components/ --out-dir dist/components/ --verbose
scripts.build:js:theme: npm run lint:js:theme && babel templates/ --out-dir dist/theme/ --verbose
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:components && npm run build:js:theme
scripts.build:js:dev: npm run lint:js && babel templates/ --out-dir dist/theme/ --source-maps true --verbose && babel components/ --out-dir dist/components/ --source-maps true --verbose
scripts.build:css: npm run build:sprite && npm run build:css:components && npm run build:css:theme && npm run vendorprefixes
scripts.build:css:dev: npm run lint:scss && sass 'templates/':'dist/theme/' && sass 'components/':'dist/components/' && npm run vendorprefixes
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:css:dev && npm run build:js:dev
scripts.watch:js:components: npm run lint:js:components && babel --watch components/ --out-dir dist/components/ --source-maps true --verbose
scripts.watch:js:theme: npm run lint:js:theme && babel templates/ --out-dir dist/theme/ --source-maps true --watch --verbose
scripts.watch:js: npm run watch:js:components & npm run watch:js:theme
scripts.watch:scss: npm run watch:scss:components & npm run watch:scss:theme
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:scss
